Text:
Here says episode 22 was aired on April 22 and it is titled "Secretary's day": http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_The_Office_(U.S._TV_series)_episodes#Season_7:_2010.E2.80.932011

So this is really episode 22 or it is episode 23?
Confirmed, this is episode 23 titled "Body Language", aired yesterday.
